verbs.description: [ARG0: Freedom Caucus members of the House of Representatives] [V: joined] [ARG1: with Democrats] [ARGM-PRP: to hand President Trump and the GOP establishment a defeat on their Farm Bill Friday] . Here 's why they did it Freedom Caucus members were demanding a vote on immigration legislation and said that they were not assured enough by the GOP leadership that they would get it . 213 members of Congress voted against the bill while 198 voted for it , with 30 Republicans voting against the bill . Additionally , they argued that there was still time to pass the farm bill , but that it was urgent to pass something on immigration . " I would say that the farm bill does n't expire until September , " said Freedom Caucus member Rep. Scotty Perry ( R - Penn . ) on Fox News . " We have plenty of time to do the farm bill , " he added , " so it 's more important right now to prioritize immigration , and we 've been asking and waiting four months . " The farm bill …

Additionally , they argued that there was still time to pass the farm bill , but that it was urgent to pass something on immigration . " I would say that the farm bill does n't expire until September , " said Freedom Caucus member Rep. Scotty Perry ( R - Penn . ) on Fox News . " We have plenty of time to do the farm bill , " he added , " so it 's more important right now to prioritize immigration , and we 've been asking and waiting four months . " The farm bill …
